subject: Re: [R] outlying
body:
At 05:29 AM 6/19/2007, elyakhlifi wrote:
>hello,
>are there functions to detecte outlying observations in samples?
>thanks.

library('car')
? outlier.test

library('outliers')
? grubbs.test
? dixon.test
? cochran.test
? chisq.out.test
